name: Bodoni
description:
Bodoni is a 2-D top-down narrative/strategy game. As a captain of a space steamship, the player will traverse a dangerous system in attempt to enter the sun. To finish the journey, the player must manage their resources, make clever choices, grow their character, and, most importantly, find their true self.

Features
  • Pilot a steamship in space
  • A complex story and a ton of choices
  • Character stats that help you survive 
  • You can go to the sun

Control Scheme 
  • WASD for ship movement
  • Tab to open map

The Team 
  • Design and Programming: Fanfu Shentu and Roger Wang 
  • Music and Sound Effects: Vicente Muñoz
Resources Used
  • Unity Assets: TextMeshPro, Unity Particle Pack 5.x
  • Textures: Solar System Scope
